016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.server;
017
018import com.codahale.metrics.Meter;
019import com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.io.ByteBufferBackedInputStream;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithResult;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.common.ExceptionObjectOutputStream;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.common.ReactiveStreamsAbstractService;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageReader;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageWriter;
027import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
028import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
029import org.eclipse.jetty.io.ByteBufferOutputStream2;
030import org.eclipse.jetty.io.ByteBufferPool;
031import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.StatusCode;
032import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.WriteCallback;
033import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
034
035import java.io.IOException;
036import java.io.ObjectOutputStream;
037import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
038import java.nio.charset.Charset;
039import java.util.Queue;
040import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
041import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue;
042import java.util.function.Function;
043
044public class SubscriberWithResultSubscriptionReactiveStream
045        extends SubscriberSubscriptionReactiveStream {
046    private final Queue<CompletableFuture<Object>> resultQueue = new ConcurrentLinkedQueue<>();
047    private final MessageWriter<Object> resultWriter;
048    boolean isFlushPending = false;
049    private ByteBufferOutputStream2 resultOutputStream;
050
051    protected final Meter resultsSent;
052
053    public SubscriberWithResultSubscriptionReactiveStream(String streamName,
054                                                          Function<Configuration, Subscriber<Object>> subscriberFactory,
055                                                          MessageReader<Object> eventReader,
056                                                          MessageWriter<Object> resultWriter,
057                                                          ObjectMapper objectMapper,
058                                                          ByteBufferPool byteBufferPool,
059                                                          MetricRegistry metricRegistry,
060                                                          Logger logger) {
061        super(streamName, subscriberFactory, eventReader, objectMapper, byteBufferPool, metricRegistry, logger);
062
063        this.resultsSent = metricRegistry.meter("subscriber." + streamName + ".results");
064
065        this.resultWriter = resultWriter;
066        resultOutputStream = new ByteBufferOutputStream2(byteBufferPool, true);
067    }
068
069    protected void onWebSocketBinary(ByteBuffer byteBuffer) {
070        try {
071            if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
072                logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketBinary {}", Charset.defaultCharset().decode(byteBuffer.asReadOnlyBuffer()).toString());
073            }
074
075            ByteBufferBackedInputStream inputStream = new ByteBufferBackedInputStream(byteBuffer);
076            Object event = eventReader.readFrom(inputStream);
077            received.mark();
078            receivedBytes.mark(byteBuffer.position());
079            byteBufferAccumulator.getByteBufferPool().release(byteBuffer);
080
081            CompletableFuture<Object> resultFuture = new CompletableFuture<>();
082            resultFuture.whenComplete(this::sendResult);
083            resultQueue.add(resultFuture);
084            event = new WithResult<>(event, resultFuture);
085
086            subscriber.onNext(event);
087        } catch (Throwable e) {
088            logger.error("Could not receive value", e);
089            subscriber.onError(e);
090            session.close(StatusCode.BAD_PAYLOAD, e.getMessage());
091        }
092    }
093
094    private synchronized void sendResult(Object result, Throwable throwable) {
095        // Send result back, but from the queue so that we ensure ordering
096        CompletableFuture<Object> future;
097        isFlushPending = false;
098        while ((future = resultQueue.peek()) != null && future.isDone()) {
099            resultQueue.remove();
100
101            future.whenComplete((r, t) ->
102            {
103                try {
104                    if (t != null) {
105                        resultOutputStream.write(ReactiveStreamsAbstractService.XOR);
106                        ObjectOutputStream out = new ExceptionObjectOutputStream(resultOutputStream);
107                        out.writeObject(t);
108                    } else {
109                        resultWriter.writeTo(r, resultOutputStream);
110                    }
111
112                    ByteBuffer data = resultOutputStream.takeByteBuffer();
113                    session.getRemote().sendBytes(data, new WriteCallback() {
114                        @Override
115                        public void writeFailed(Throwable x) {
116                            logger.error(marker, "Could not send result", x);
117                            byteBufferPool.release(data);
118                        }
119
120                        @Override
121                        public void writeSuccess() {
122                            byteBufferPool.release(data);
123                            resultsSent.mark();
124                            logger.trace("Sent result: {}", r);
125                            isFlushPending = true;
126                        }
127                    });
128                } catch (IOException ex) {
129                    logger.error(marker, "Could not send result", ex);
130                    session.close(StatusCode.SERVER_ERROR, ex.getMessage());
131                }
132            });
133        }
134        if (isFlushPending) {
135            try {
136                session.getRemote().flush();
137            } catch (IOException e) {
138                logger.error(marker, "Could not flush results", e);
139                session.close(StatusCode.SERVER_ERROR, e.getMessage());
140            }
141        }
142    }
143}
